ygData.subject: Hello Loveies
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes - for a bunch of songsters we have been silent too long   ;) I retired my bard at level 21 cause I wanted to concentrate on my druid. Since then I have
ygData.messageBody:
Yes - for a bunch of songsters we have been silent too long ;)

I "retired" my bard at level 21 cause I wanted to concentrate on my druid. Since then I have almost quit playing, but recently have picked up again.

If you are ever on Drinal look for a charming halfling druid named Charai or a loverly half-elf bard named Jovvi Songangel & say "HEY!!!"

Charai plays in IC or EW & Jovvi is wandering around not really working on much, but basically playing around. LOL

TTFN for now all

The charmingly loverly --
\
Jovvi
